value:
$WmMPID_水着カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|This is it—the final battle.
...Huh? Where is everyone?$k$p$WmMPID_水着エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Whaaat? Xander? Leo? Corrin?
Where did you all go?!$k$p$WmMPID_水着マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|Where in the world are we? We must
regroup with Corrin quickly, or else...$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|And everyone was asking why I have
no interest in tropical islands...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_水着マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|You have shown us sufficient power.
Victory is yours.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|We did it! And the Nohrian royalty
looked just amazing in action!
(...And in their swimsuits.)$k$pI can't even begin to guess what sort
of price this will all fetch.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Oh, that reminds me... I have a letter
for you, Anna. It's from Anna.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Ahh, probably just checking up on her
new business partner. Let's see what
we have here...$k$p"To whom it may concern: If you
wish to use moving pictures rather
than still images...$k$pYou must pay a contract fee as
itemized in the included report?!"$k$p$EFace_Pain|$w0|What?! This figure! There are even
more zeroes than before! This would
bankrupt the Order!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I guess Anna is always going to be
Anna, no matter where she's from.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Grr... I didn't want to resort to this, but
I have no other options...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Alfonse! Sharena!
$Nu!
Take off your clothes!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|C-come again?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I'm not going to charge myself any
outrageous fees if I take swimsuit
shots of you! So change into these!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|You can't be serious! This swimsuit...
It's too embarrassing!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Calm yourself, Commander Anna!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Sorry, Alfonse, but there's no other
way. It's for the Order! Oh, I know—
I'll model a swimsuit, too!$k$pSo we have four swimsuit models.
We can still turn a profit, we just—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Get ahold of yourself, Commander!
$Nu, stop her!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I'm not giving up! Get your hands off
me! Don't drag me back to the castle!$k$p$Sbs150|
